snippet.title: Haven - Couples Update - Available now for free!
snippet.description:
The second update for Haven is now available for free on PC (Steam, GOG & Epic Games Store), PlayStation 4 & 5, Xbox One & Series and Nintendo Switch. 

You will now be able to choose which couple you want to play as. You can choose to play as the existing Yu and Kay as you know them, as two women (Yu and an alternate version of Kay) or as two men (Kay and an alternate version of Yu). Note that this choice only impacts the characters you play as, but the gameplay and the story stay the same. 

- - -
More about Haven:
Yu and Kay have escaped to a forgotten planet, leaving everything they knew behind. Play two lovers at the same time as they settle into an unknown world. 
A RPG adventure about love and freedom, to play solo or with a special someone.

Find your store: http://www.thegamebakers.com/haven/
Check the game merchandise: http://www.thegamebakers.com/merch
Join our Discord here: https://discord.gg/thegamebakers

- - -
From the creators of Furi.
Original music by Danger -  ℗ 2019 1789 - © 1789 http://2emedanger.com/
